description:
Athletic and responsive, these lightweight shoes feel like runners but have trail-worthy support and grip. Breathable mesh uppers let in cool air to keep your feet from getting swampy during the summer. A responsive midsole with an aggressive tread pattern adds stability to steep sections of trail.

  • Breathable mesh upper with printed overlays for durability
  • EVA midsole provides smooth transitions
  • Eco-friendly OrthoLite® EVA footbed cushions feet and makes 15km hikes feel like 5km
  • O FIT Insole® provides support and comfort for long days on your feet
  • Bellows tongue adds comfort and keeps trail debris out
  • Trail Tread rubber outsoles offer excellent slip-resistance and durability
  • Aggressive lugs in a multi-directional pattern for effective propulsion and braking
name: Oboz Katabatic Low Light Trail Shoes - Men's
